welcome_message_body: "Welcome to the charming city of Kirkcaldy! Known for its beautiful coastal views and rich history, we invite you to explore all that our city has to offer and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Edinburgh Airport houses all check-in desks, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Gates Terminal
terminals.description: The gates terminal at Edinburgh Airport is where passengers board their flights and includes a variety of shops and restaurants.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 2 hours by providing their email address.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Perth Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leuchars Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dundee Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern facilities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dundee Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free Wi-Fi throughout the airport terminal.
